thread.title: Ted Cruz Trump Joint Session of Congress Speech Encouraging Night
thread.title_full: Ted Cruz Trump Joint Session of Congress Speech Encouraging Night

author: Fox News Insider
title: Ted Cruz Trump Joint Session of Congress Speech Encouraging Night
text:
7 P 
Trump's speech echoed throughout Washington. Now, Newt Gingrich and Mike Huckabee react on The First 100 Days . 8 P 
Vice President Mike Pence sounds off on the president's big congressional speech on The O'Reilly Factor . 9 P 
Mike Rowe wants government to create jobs, teach skills and make opportunities. He explains how on Tucker Carlson Tonight .
